title: Dove Cameron interview: 'Bullies forced me to leave school. I was just so lonely'
text:
I'm sitting in a hotel room with a 23-year-old who has seven million more Instagram followers than Harry Styles. You've heard of Harry Styles, but have you heard of Dove Cameron? To the millions of children who watch the Disney Channel, Cameron is a household name: the star who played both twins in the hit show Liv and Maddie between 2013 and 2017; released several songs that topped the Billboard Kids Digital Songs Chart; and stars as the lead in the Descendants movie series, whose third instalment is released this month.

Descendants is a phenomenon of High School Musical proportions. Recording the highest ever viewing figures on Disney Channel when it premiered in 2015, the original film followed...
description: I'm sitting in a hotel room with a 23-year-old who has seven million more Instagram followers than Harry Styles.
